mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (nickname, username, gender, password, email, mobile, location, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{username}, #{gender}, #{password}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{location}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select count(1) from user where username = #{username}
select count(1) from user where email = #{email}
select count(1) from user where mobile = #{mobile}
select * from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
